front.title: Alert-Info URNs for the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP)

abstract.t: The Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) supports the capability toprovide a reference to a specific rendering to be used by the UA whenthe user is alerted. This is done using the Alert-Info header.However, the reference addresses only network resources with specificrendering properties. There is currently no support for predefinedstandard identifiers for describing the semantics of the alertingsituation or the characteristics of the alerting signal, withoutbeing tied to a particular rendering. To overcome this limitationand support new applications, a new family of URNs for use in SIPAlert-Info header fields is defined in this specification.
